children.name: Demeter
children.bio: The goddess of the harvest and agriculture.

children.name: Poseidon
children.bio: The "Earth Shaker." God of the Sea. One of the twelve Olympians.

children.name: Zeus
children.bio: The sky and thunder god. Ruled as king of the gods of Mount Olympus.

children.name: Hera
children.bio: The goddess of women and marriage.

children.name: Hestia
children.bio: A virgin goddess of the hearth, architecture, and the right ordering of domesticity, the family, the home, and the state.
